titleStmt.title: A Brief chronicle of the Turkish War, from July to January, 1664 turned out of high-Dutch ; together with his Imperial Majesties reasons for the undertaking of the war, and a map for the better understanding of the story.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Mabb fo[r] Henry Brome, at the Gun in Ivy-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
